channel.title: The new Friday the 13th Movie
channel.description:
Travis and I went to see this movie on...when else....Friday the 13th. And we thought it sucked!!
The movie had a lot of boobs and drugs in it...so I'm sure all of the guys are going to run out and watch it now. But it didn't follow the original Friday's at all!!!! Ugh.
Has anyone else seen it? Did you like it at all?

item.title: The new Friday the 13th Movie
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:25, topic:262775”]I think I’m gonna see it. It’d be nice to see naked teens getting stabbed at crystal lake again.

You know what was a bad movie? The one where jason is in space. Haha, what the fuck were they thinking.[/quote]

You mean that ‘Jason X’ movie? I heard that one was terrible!

Read full topic

item.title: The new Friday the 13th Movie
item.dc:creator: @Square Square
item.description:
@Square wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:25, topic:262775”]You know what was a bad movie? The one where jason is in space. Haha, what the fuck were they thinking.[/quote]I remember watching that thinking to myself, “Wait, why is Crystal Lake now in space?”. I’m sure there was an explanation earlier in the movie that a missed, but either way it was retarded.

item.title: The new Friday the 13th Movie
item.dc:creator: @Tenac Tenac
item.description:
@Tenac wrote:

I saw it on Friday the 13th with some friends, and the only thing worth seeing is the sex scenes, boobs, and the funny asian and black dude. Other than that, it was just loud noises trying to scare us the entire time and everyone dieing throughout the entire movie which got kinda old.

Read full topic

…Is that right?

item.title: The new Friday the 13th Movie
item.dc:creator: @Bebemycat2 Bebe
item.description:
@Bebemycat2 wrote:

[quote=“srt8, post:3, topic:262775”][quote author=Bebe link=topic=347016.msg2672919#msg2672919 date=1234902365]
I planned to go see this movie but then I figured it was going to be just another dumb remake of a good older movie so I saw Taken instead.

Are they going to remake all the Friday the 13th’s?
[/quote]

I really hope not. It was so bad. Jason was like running after people, and instead of just using the knife to kill them he was getting creative and doing all of this other stuff. I just didn’t like it since I liked the others one so much. I mean, it still had us jumping in our seats, but I would not see it again.[/quote]
They should have just kept the classic style of Jason walking around hacking up people with his machete. Maybe I’ll rent it when it comes out on DVD though.

Read full topic
